name: gulp-windowed
author: Tomer Aberbach <tomeraberbach@gmail.com> (https://tomeraberba.ch)
description: Processes and maps files in windows/arrays of a specified size.

scripts.deploy:patch: npm version patch && git add package.json package-lock.json && git commit -m "patch" && npm run push && npm publish
scripts.deploy:minor: npm version minor && git add package.json package-lock.json && git commit -m "minor" && npm run push && npm publish
scripts.deploy:major: npm version major && git add package.json package-lock.json && git commit -m "major" && npm run push && npm publish
